conversations.body_text: Hi warrendongo5,    I'm sorry I didn't update you in a timely manner.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326637291DE

Hello, the pedals finally arrived a few days ago! Thanks!

 No I have integrared them into my simrig and I have a problem.

I calibrated them and check them on the simsonn software and seems ok, but
windows does not get any data from the axis. I mean, windows recognices the
device, knows that has 3 axis but no input is gathered. I think, because of
this, muy simulators (LMU mainly) cant recognize the pedals, I cant assigt
the controls, so right now it is unusable.

I attach a video hoping it will help with my description. Also it can be
seen that sometimes a value is not registered but that could be a software
bug, i do not know. Also, the ground wire is not installed yet, I do not
have the suitable allen key.

Also, in another theme, due to the delays in shipping, in one of my
tickets, it said that the shipping cost will be refunded. I do not know how
that process goes or if I missundestud this. I can reply to that specific
message if it is necessary.

I hope we can fix this, and thank you for your support.
Ignacio.

El mié, 31 dic 2025, 10:40, service@simsonn.com 
Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.
Also I checked different usb ports, 2.0 and 3.0. Same issue (wasnt even detected on 3.0)

Hi warrendongo5,    Please follow the steps below:    Press and hold the upgrade button on the PlusX main controller, then reconnect the USB cable.    Open SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3 and check if it has entered recovery mode.    If recovery mode is detected, go to Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu.    After the update is complete, test the device to see if it has been restored successfully.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
